page.title: 01ETTINGTON VILLAGE
page.content: Ettington is a village six miles east of Stratford-upon-Avon.It lies on what used to be the cross roads of the Stratford-Banbury road and the Warwick - Halford road, although the latter has now been straightened and by-passes the village to the west. The main part of the village has developed along the Stratford Road with a few smaller roads and lanes leading from it.The oldest houses seem to date from the seventeenth century although some have parts reputedly earlier than this. Ettington was originally Upper Ettington, with Lower Ettington centred aruond Ettington Park.The spelling of Ettington has changed over the years.As recently as the 1950's it was Eatington and was called Eatintone for many centuries before that.
